MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML3 and ML9 postcode area of Hamilton and Larkhall. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:49pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:51pm on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
